import{useEffect}from"react";export function useKey(key,action){// 检测按键
useEffect(function(){const Escape=e=>{//增加容错率
if(e.code.toLowerCase()===key.toLowerCase()){action();console.log("".concat(e.code," down"));}};document.addEventListener('keydown',Escape);// function cleanUp
return function(){document.removeEventListener('keydown',Escape);};},[key,action]);}
